headline: A Look at eBay's (EBAY) Valuation Following Recent Share Price Decline
summary: Shares of eBay (EBAY) have been on a downward trend over the past month, sliding roughly 15%. Investors are taking a close look at what might be driving this recent stretch, especially in the context of the stock’s year-to-date gains. See our latest analysis for eBay. Despite the recent pullback, eBay’s 30.5% share price return year-to-date reflects a strong run in 2024. Its 1-year total shareholder return of 35.8% shows solid long-term momentum. After such gains, a bit of volatility is...
